event.title: was founded by Captain Charles Maria Weber in 1849

data.event: It was founded by Captain Charles Maria Weber in 1849 after he acquired Rancho Campo de los Franceses.

event.title: is located on the San Joaquin River in northern San Joaquin Valley and has an estimated population of 302,389 as of 2014

data.event: The city is located on the San Joaquin River in northern San Joaquin Valley and has an estimated population of 302,389 as of 2014.

event.title: was named an All-America City in the year 1999

data.event: It was named an All-America City in the year 1999 and 2004 and is home to the largest inland seaport in California.
